epic.title: Workspace Reorganization - Root Directory Cleanup
epic.description: Systematic reorganization of claude-flow-novice workspace to reduce root directory from 273 files to <20 files, consolidate test artifacts, and establish maintainable directory structure

objectives: Reduce root directory files from 273 to <20 configuration files only
Consolidate 8+ result directories into unified reports/ structure
Move 50+ test files to tests/manual/ with path reference updates
Create .artifacts/ directory for all ephemeral test/build data
Update 163+ build path references across 120+ files
Update 180+ test result references across 85+ files
Maintain backward compatibility and zero downtime during migration
constraints: README files remain in root for discoverability (user requirement)
coordination.md, memory-bank.md, claude-soul.md stay in root (user requirement)
All changes must pass CI/CD validation before merge
No breaking changes to published npm package API
Git history must be preserved using git mv commands
Docker containers must remain operational throughout migration
